title: Bower Collective Natural Limescale Remover Spray Refill, Powerful Bathroom Cleaner & Shower Screen Cleaner, Daily Multi Surface Cleaner for Taps, Sinks & Toilets, 1 Litre
features: MAXIMUM STRENGTH LIMESCALE REMOVAL: Our eco-friendly limescale remover spray is proven twice as effective as leading brands. This powerful formula tackles stubborn lime scale buildup on shower screens, taps, toilets, sinks, and tiles, leaving surfaces sparkling clean without harsh chemicals.

NATURALLY DERIVED FORMULA: Unlike conventional bathroom cleaners, our shower spray uses plant-based ingredients that effectively dissolve limescale while being gentle on the planet. Completely free from harsh chemicals like SLS and parabens, it's suitable for septic tanks and all domestic settings.

MULTI-SURFACE CLEANING POWER: This versatile daily shower spray works as both a bathroom cleaner and kitchen cleaner, tackling hard water deposits and soap scum across multiple surfaces. Simply spray, leave briefly, and wipe for streak-free results that last.

ECO-FRIENDLY REFILL SYSTEM: Our 1L pouch delivers over 600 sprays and pairs perfectly with our reusable trigger spray bottle (sold separately). Join the refill revolution and eliminate single-use plastic waste from your cleaning routine while enjoying professional-grade results. Simply refill dispensers and return empty pouches to be reused and recycled for free using our FREEPOST address, which is printed on the back of the pouch. Pop it in an envelope, write the address on it, and drop it in a post box.

SUSTAINABLY MADE IN THE UK: Vegan, cruelty-free and manufactured in Britain using ethically sourced ingredients. As a certified B Corp company, we're committed to creating natural cleaning products that are effective, environmentally responsible, and safe for your home.
